text:
^Eilormation Section
12 September 1958
Mr, Robert £• Underwood, Jr#, Network Mnnager
Notional Association of Educational Broadcasters
119 Gregory Hell
University of Illinois
Urbana, Qlinois
Dear Mr# Underwood:
We are mailing Ibis date under separate cover copies of each of the 39
"Queen of BatUe" shows chosen for use on the NAEB Net# We are looking fore¬
word to their being aired by the Association's member stations#
Each show bears the distribution number assigned by this office# As a
result, inasmuch as they have been extracted from the series as a whole, they
are not in numbrical sequence. None of the tapes contain the NAEB standard
closing cue, but in most cases there is sufficient latitude so that the tag could be
added without exceeding 14:30 if it is necessary#
May we ask that when the compliment of stations airing "Queen of Battle"
has been completed, we be provided a list of Uiose stations so that they may be
included in our required reports.
I would like to say again how proud we are to have the "Queen of Battle"
series accepted for distribution by the NAEB# U there is any further help that
we may give, please call on us#
Sincerely,
AEAN G. EASTON
1st lieutenant, inf
Chief. Radio Unit
